title: Ivan the Terrible = Ivan der Schreckliche [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Motoko Sakaguchi, Videoland and Naxos Deutschland
brief_description: Performance of Sergei Prokofiev’s “Ivan the Terrible” in two acts by the Ballet and Orchestra of the Bolshoi Opera Moscow at the Bolshoi Theater. Choreography by Yuri Grigorovich and featuring dancers Yuri Vladimirov, Batalya Bessmertnaya, Boris Akimov and Anastasya Akimov. Note: subtext is in Russian and credits in German.
